preibisch_imagelib2.algorithm.stats

Interface HistogramBinMapper<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntBinMapper, RealBinMapper

    public interface HistogramBinMapper<T>
    An interface used by the Histogram class to map Type objects to histogram bins.
    Author:
    2011 Larry Lindsey, Larry Lindsey

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getMaxBin()
      Returns the maximum bin for the histogram.
      T getMinBin()
      Returns the minimum bin for the histogram.
      int getNumBins()
      Returns the number of bins for the histogram.
      T invMap(int i)
      Maps a given histogram bin index to a Type containing the bin center value.
      int map(T type)
      Maps a given Type to its histogram bin.

    • Method Detail

      • getMinBin

        T getMinBin()
        Returns the minimum bin for the histogram. This value may not be relevant for histograms over Type's that do not have a natural order.
        Returns:
        the minimum bin Type for the histogram.

      • getMaxBin

        T getMaxBin()
        Returns the maximum bin for the histogram. This value may not be relevant for histograms over Type's that do not have a natural order.
        Returns:
        the maximum bin Type for the histogram.

      • getNumBins

        int getNumBins()
        Returns the number of bins for the histogram.
        Returns:
        the number of bins for the histogram.

      • map

        int map(T type)
        Maps a given Type to its histogram bin.
        Parameters:
        type - the Type to map.
        Returns:
        the histogram bin index.

      • invMap

        T invMap(int i)
        Maps a given histogram bin index to a Type containing the bin center value.
        Parameters:
        i - the histogram bin index to map.
        Returns:
        a Type containing the bin center value.
